{"step_by_step_thinking": "The ASCOM complex, also known as the ASC-2 and TBLR1 corepressor complex, is a protein complex that plays a role in gene expression. MLL3, also known as KMT2C, is a histone methyltransferase that is part of the COMPASS (complex proteins associated with Set1) family. The ASCOM complex and the COMPASS family are distinct entities, and MLL3 is not a component of the ASCOM complex.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
